data.name: Project CARS - Modified Car Pack
data.detailed_description:
Add three limited-run custom machines to your garage with the Modified Car Pack – the Pagani Zonda Cinque Roadster, Ariel Atom 3 Mugen, and the all-new Ruf CTR3 SMS-R…
• With only five chassis ever built, the Pagani Zonda Cinque Roadster is an open-top hypercar with a monstrous top speed, racecar levels of downforce, and extravagant beauty to match its multi-million dollar price tag.
• Created in celebration of the ten year anniversary of the original ground-breaking track racer, the Ariel Atom 3 takes just 2.9 seconds to go from 0-60.
• Further blurring the lines between reality and gaming, the Ruf CTR3 SMS-R is the result of a collaboration between veteran developers Slightly Mad Studios and Ruf to make a race-spec version of the already-impressive CTR3 super sports car.

data.short_description: Add three limited-run custom machines to your garage with the Modified Car Pack – the Pagani Zonda Cinque Roadster, Ariel Atom 3 Mugen, and the all-new Ruf CTR3 SMS-R.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7 with latest Service Packs
  • Processor: 2.66 GHz Intel Core 2 Quad Q8400, 3.0 GHz AMD Phenom II X4 940
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 260, ATI Radeon HD 5770
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 with latest Service Packs
  • Processor: 3.5 GHz Intel Core i7 3700, 4.0 GHz AMD FX-8350
  • Graphics: GT600 series, AMD Radeon HD7000 series
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
